articles.description: Under pressure Thomas Frank receives a much-needed boost as an impressive first-half display sees Tottenham beat 10-man Borussia Dortmund in the Champions League.
articles.title: Tottenham 2-0 Borussia Dortmund: Under-pressure Thomas Frank oversees much-needed win

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Inter Milan vs Arsenal in the UEFA Champions League
articles.title: Inter Milan vs Arsenal: UEFA Champions League stats & head-to-head

articles.description: Audi is entering Formula 1 for the first time in its history this season, having taken over the Swiss-based Sauber team.
articles.title: Audi: New Formula 1 outfit aim to become must successful team in history

articles.description: Kylian Mbappe scores twice as Real Madrid thrash Monaco in Alvaro Arbeloa's first Champions League game in charge of the Spanish side.
articles.title: Real Madrid 6-1 Monaco: Kylian Mbappe scores twice against former club in convincing win

articles.description: How Naomi Osaka's jellyfish-inspired outfit stole the show in her hard-fought Australian Open first-round win over Antonia Ruzic.
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: Naomi Osaka's jellyfish-inspired outfit steals show in win over Antonia Ruzic

articles.description: Manchester City suffered their very own "hell of a beating" moment in Norway on Tuesday - now Pep Guardiola and his players must turn around their fortunes in an increasingly trying January.
articles.title: Man City 'battered in Bodo' - is this more than just a blip?

articles.description: Champions League holders Paris St-Germain miss the chance to all but mathematically secure their place in the knockout stages as they suffer a shock 2-1 defeat to Sporting in Lisbon.
articles.title: Sporting 2-1 Paris St-Germain: Goalkeeping errors cost holders in shock defeat

articles.description: Luke Littler wins the inaugural Saudi Arabia Darts Masters with an emphatic 8-5 victory over Michael van Gerwen in Riyadh.
articles.title: Saudi Arabia Darts Masters: Luke Littler wins inaugural event by beating Michael van Gerwen

articles.description: Alexandra Eala may have only played one Australian Open singles match but she was the biggest first-round draw by far at Melbourne Park.
articles.title: Australian Open 2026: How Alexandra Eala and Melbourne Park were overwhelmed by her popularity

articles.description: We look at what the four teams left standing need to do to make it to Super Bowl 60 and the key factors in Sunday's Conference  Championship games.
articles.title: NFL Championship Games Preview: How Seahawks, Rams, Patriots & Broncos can make Super Bowl 60
